game.name: The Office Guy
game.description: This office is corrupt. Manager and Boss kill people who dont follow the rules. So our hero has stepped up and going to kill the boss. With a small comic strip "the office guy" story begins. There are 10 tasks to complete and in the end you have to collect the briefcase to complete the game. Attack employees by baseball bat...pickup guns and bombs to kill them. Read description when the task starts. Its a action packed game with awesome sounds and grapics...Go kill some bad guys!
game.metaTitle: The Office Guy, Fighting Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game The Office Guy at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: The Office Guy Game, Action Games, fighting Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: L ICONS TO MOVE L-R, RIGHT IONS TO PICK THE ITEMS AND ATTACK
